comment: If two structures have the same components (properties), one is an associative algebra iff the other one is. The last hypotheses on ` 1r ` can be discharged either by letting ` W = _V ` (if strong equality is known on ` .s ` ) or assuming ` K ` is a ring. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 5-Jul-2015.)
